item.description:
Help us find the 2024 Class of #BloombergCatalysts!

Do you know someone who's bettering the planet with a one of a kind idea? We're looking for leaders across business, philanthropy and government whose innovations and efforts have the ability to create meaningful change.

Pictured here is the Class of 2023 at the #NewEconomyForum in Singapore:

Filip L√∂vstr√∂m Co-Founder & CEO at @roamelectric
Pelonomi Moiloa Co-Founder & CEO @LelapaAI
Vriko Yu Co-Founder & CEO @Archireef
Shahir Chowdhury Founder & CEO at Shikho
Claudia Kolonas Co-Founder Pulang (Indonesia)
Charlot Magayi Founder @MukuruStoves
Oriana Papin-Zoghbi Co-Founder & CEO @AOA_Dx
Manu Chopra Co-Founder & CEO Karya
Guy Hudson Co-Founder & CEO at @loambio

Submit 2024 nominations no later than Monday 2/19! bloom.bg/3OA1LDj
